name: places/ChIJ8xVB4KhZwokRapuFDzJmNXI
formattedAddress: 320 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 320 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017-5900, USA

originalText.text: Leslie was a tremendous help making my tight and tricky space in a studio apartment functional and manageable! Leslie was an absolute pleasure to work with and was so accommodating with my needs. She helped to devise and implement an organization system within the apartment that would specifically work for me. Together we downsized my belongings- not an easy task for someone as indecisive as myself! Leslie had great ideas for creative storage solutions and out of the box ideas, often helpful for small spaces like nyc apartments, that I never would have thought of myself. She took the time to send me product ideas or links to purchase them after meeting. Leslie also has a great eye for design and decor- cannot recommend her enough!!

originalText.text: Leslie was awesome in so many ways: patient, kind, motivating and compassionate. Moving back to parents' home was a challenge to combine my seven rooms worth of furniture and stuff with my parents' stuff. We combed through boxes in the garage and basement and purged a great deal. Donated to others. Leslie was very diligent and dedicated and I would hire her again. thanks, Leslie

originalText.text:
I can’t say enough great things about Leslie & Mindful Organizing. My gf & I recently moved in together and are dealing with a space issue: 2 people & all their possessions in a Manhattan apartment...
Leslie was very organized and practical, she did an excellent job of helping us declutter and rearrange for a much more comfortable apartment. Anyone looking for an expert to come in from the outside with a trained eye, I highly recommend Leslie, she has a wonderful demeanor and helped us out tremendously. 5 star service for sure! Thank you Leslie!!

originalText.text: I was at my wits end when I contacted Leslie of MINDFUL ORGANIZING. I had lived with a cluttered kitchen for too long. Leslie knew just how to approach all the items that had built up over the years, clearing, organizing and helping me decide what to keep, discard or donate. I finally have a kitchen I enjoy being in. Thank you, Leslie!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Leslie Timko. She helped my wife declutter the piles of stuff that had accumulated in our spare room. Through Leslie’s thoughtful process, my wife began to let things go. Leslie helped both of us see the many possibilities that our Brooklyn Coop has to offer. I believe that it was Leslie's mindful listening skills that pushed us in the right direction.
